organic.title: Delete or restore your site - Google Help
organic.snippet: On a computer, open a site in classic Google Sites. Click Settings Settings and then Manage Site. Click General and then Delete this site.

organic.title: Deleting old website from Google search
organic.snippet: Use the Remove Outdated Content tool to have Google update search results for pages or images that no longer exist.
